name: Plagueopus
description:
For Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

CONTROLS:

- Click on a building to latch to it

- Collide with a person to absorb and synthesize them

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We had something complete that took us the entire week of the game jam, but we didn't back it up and sadly it got corrupt like 2 hours before the deadline... SO HERE'S A GLORIOUS PLAN B, CONSTRUCTED FROM THE ESSENCE OF GOD IN JUST 2 HOURS! :) :) :)
